name: CommercialLoan
explanatoryNote: Such loans may include those that provide working capital, are used to finance the purchase of equipment and/or materials, for facilities and/or improvement of facilities, and so forth, and are typically secured.
definition: loan extended to a corporation, commercial enterprise, joint venture, or other organization as opposed to a consumer
label: commercial loan

name: hasBusinessPurposeDescription
label: has business purpose description
definition: provides a description of the purpose of the loan from the perspective of the borrower
